title: 3dECM
description: Performs degree centrality on a dataset using a given maskfile via the 3dECM command

autoclip.title: Autoclip
autoclip.description: Clip off low-intensity regions in the dataset.

automask.title: Automask
automask.description: Mask the dataset to target brain-only voxels.

eps.title: Eps
eps.description: Sets the stopping criterion for the power iteration; :math:`l2\|v_\text{old} - v_\text{new}\| < eps\|v_\text{old}\|`; default = 0.001.

fecm.title: Fecm
fecm.description: Fast centrality method; substantial speed increase but cannot accommodate thresholding; automatically selected if -thresh or -sparsity are not set.

full.title: Full
full.description: Full power method; enables thresholding; automatically selected if -thresh or -sparsity are set.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Mask file to mask input data.

max_iter.title: Max iter
max_iter.description: Sets the maximum number of iterations to use in the power iteration; default = 1000.

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Limit memory consumption on system by setting the amount of gb to limit the algorithm to; default = 2gb.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Scale correlation coefficients in similarity matrix to after shifting, x >= 0.0; default = 1.0 for -full, 0.5 for -fecm.

shift.title: Shift
shift.description: Shift correlation coefficients in similarity matrix to enforce non-negativity, s >= 0.0; default = 0.0 for -full, 1.0 for -fecm.

sparsity.title: Sparsity
sparsity.description: Only take the top percent of connections.

thresh.title: Thresh
thresh.description: Threshold to exclude connections where corr <= thresh.
